#!/bin/bash
declare -a servers=("web1" "web2" "db1" "cache1")

for server in "${servers[@]}"; do
    echo "Checking ${server}..."
    ping -c 1 "${server}.example.com" > /dev/null 2>&1
    if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
        echo "  ${server} is UP"
    else
        echo "  ${server} is DOWN"
    fi
done

echo "Total servers: ${#servers[@]}"
